scopes.accounting.contacts: Grant read-write access to contacts and contact groups
scopes.accounting.contacts.read: Grant read-only access to contacts and contact groups
scopes.accounting.reports.read: Grant read-only access to accounting reports
scopes.accounting.settings: Grant read-write access to organisation and account settings
scopes.accounting.settings.read: Grant read-only access to organisation and account settings
scopes.accounting.transactions: Grant read-write access to bank transactions, credit notes, invoices, repeating invoices
scopes.assets.read: Grant read-only access to fixed assets
scopes.email: Grant read-only access to your email
scopes.files: Grant read-write access to files and folders
scopes.files.read: Grant read-only access to files and folders
scopes.openid: Grant read-only access to your open id
scopes.paymentservices: Grant read-write access to payment services
scopes.payroll.employees: Grant read-write access to payroll employees
scopes.payroll.employees.read: Grant read-only access to payroll employees
scopes.payroll.leaveapplications: Grant read-write access to payroll leaveapplications
scopes.payroll.leaveapplications.read: Grant read-only access to payroll leaveapplications
scopes.payroll.payitems: Grant read-write access to payroll payitems
scopes.payroll.payitems.read: Grant read-only access to payroll payitems
scopes.payroll.payrollcalendars: Grant read-write access to payroll calendars
scopes.payroll.payrollcalendars.read: Grant read-only access to payroll calendars
scopes.payroll.payruns: Grant read-write access to payroll payruns
scopes.payroll.payruns.read: Grant read-only access to payroll payruns
scopes.payroll.payslip: Grant read-write access to payroll payslips
scopes.payroll.payslip.read: Grant read-only access to payroll payslips
scopes.payroll.settings.read: Grant read-only access to payroll settings
scopes.payroll.superfundproducts.read: Grant read-only access to payroll superfundproducts
scopes.payroll.superfunds: Grant read-write access to payroll superfunds
scopes.payroll.superfunds.read: Grant read-only access to payroll superfunds
